name: Hamstring Stretch
instructions: Sit on the floor with one leg extended straight. Lean forward from your hips toward the toes of the extended leg. Hold and switch sides.

name: Quad Stretch
instructions: Stand on one leg, bringing your heel towards your buttocks. Hold your ankle with your hand. Keep your knees close together. Repeat on the other leg.

name: Calf Stretch
instructions: Stand facing a wall. Place one foot forward and bend the knee. Keep the back leg straight with the heel on the ground. Hold and switch sides.

name: Shoulder Stretch
instructions: Bring your right arm across your chest. Use your left hand to gently pull your right arm closer to your chest. Hold and switch sides.

name: Neck Stretch
instructions: Gently tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear towards your shoulder. Hold and repeat on the other side. Avoid rolling your neck.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
instructions: Kneel on your right knee with your left foot in front, forming a 90-degree angle. Push your hips forward slightly, feeling a stretch in your right hip. Hold and switch sides.
